CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice with call for competition
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 08C01

SHORT_DESCR.P: PCI DSS, PCI ACS and PIN Security audit — 1st lot.
MasterCard Personalization audit — 2nd lot.

TITLE.P: PCI DSS, PCI ACS and PCI Security

SHORT_DESCR.P: Bidders are invited to submit their bids in a written form, signed and sealed in double envelopes. Bidders must possess necessary financial and technical resources in order to fulfill the contract. Those who want to become a bidder on the tender may get the additional information in Azerbaijani language, 54, Bul-bul av., Baku (Chief İnformation Security Officer: Eldar Dursunov (012 505 21 51 (int 8079)), Coordinator: Rustam Rustamli, Telephone:(+994 12) 505 21 51 (int 8080)) after transferring the participation fee on corresponding stages to the following bank account as indicated below.
In order to participate on the tender the bidders must provide the following documents:
— written request for participation,
— bank receipt verifying your payed participation fee,
— bid (it must remain valid for a minimum of 30 banking days (until 11.5.2018) after the date that bid envelopes are opened (29.3.2018)),
— bank guarantee in 1 % amount of the bid (it must remain valid for a minimum of 30 banking days after the date that bid envelopes are opened (until 22.6.2018)),
— certificate (reference) from an official tax organization showing present or past responsibilities (obligations) regarding taxes and/or other compulsory payments owed in the Republic of Azerbaijan,
— a copy of a financial report approved by the tax organizations showing the bidder’s activities in the last 12 months,
— reference from a bank attesting to the bidder’s financial condition in the last 12 months,
— complete name of the bidder: legal status, charter/mission, country of registration and company and bank details,
— certificates of origin and conformity for corresponding goods,
— other requirements.
Documents must be compiled and submitted in Azerbaijani language, including a single copy (original). Bids written in any language other than Azerbaijani must be translated.
Bidding Procedure will be held in accordance with the “Law on Public Procurements of the Republic of Azerbaijan”.
In order to participate on the tender, bidders must submit:
1) the documents mentioned above (with the exception of bid and bank guarantee) by 27.3.2018 till 18:00; and
2) bid and bank guarantee by 28.3.2018 till 18:00, in sealed double envelopes to this address 54, Bul-bul av., Baku.
Bids received after the deadline will be sent back unopened.
Bids will be opened at 23.2.2018 at 11:00 am. at the address 54, Bul-bul av., Baku.
Bidder’s authorized representatives may attend the bid opening.
Participation fee for stage 1 — 150 AZN.
Account Number:
Tax Identification Number.
Name of the Bank:
“Azerbaijan İntenational Bank” OJSC.
“Customer Service Department”.
Code:
Tax Identification Number:
Correspondence Account Number:
SWIFT:
IBAZAZ2X
The participation fee will not be reimbursed in any case.

In order to participate on the tender the bidders must provide the following documents:

— a copy of a financial report approved by the tax organizations showing the bidder’s activities in the last 12 months,
— reference from a bank attesting to the bidder’s financial condition in the last 12 months,
— complete name of the bidder, legal status, charter/mission, country of registration and company and bank details,
— certificates of origin and conformity for corresponding goods,
— other requirements.
Documents must be compiled and submitted in Azerbaijani language, including a single copy (original). Bids written in any language other than Azerbaijani must be translated.
Bidding Procedure will be held in accordance with the “Law On Public Procurements of the Republic of Azerbaijan”.
In order to participate on the tender, bidders must submit:

1) the documents mentioned above (with the exception of bid and bank guarantee) by 27.3.2018 till 18:00; and2) bid and bank guarantee by 28.3.2018 till 18:00, in sealed double envelopes to this address 54, Bul-bul av., Baku.
Bids received after the deadline will be sent back unopened.
Bids will be opened at 23.2.2018 at 11:00 am. at the address 54, Bul-bul av., Baku.
Bidder’s authorized representatives may attend the bid opening.

INFO_ADD.P: There is no choose of Azerbaijani language, but in accordance to the law Bids must be submitted in Azerbaijani as well.
